findings.title: Absence of Zero Address Validation
findings.description: The Token Contract's authorizeCompetition function updates a mapping without validating if the address is zero, which can lead to unwanted behavior.

findings.title: Absence of Error messages in Require Statements
findings.description: The Multisig contract includes a few functions that don’t contain any error message in the require statement.

findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility.
